title: bhajasi nA kim
sahitya:
bhajasi na kim bata kamalEsham


caraNam 1    aja bhava vAsava makuTa virAjita maNi kiraNAncita pada dEsham
    caraNam 2    kalayasi nO kimu muhurati shItalam dhana rahitam dayita nivEsham
    caraNam 3    priya sakhamAshraya sarasijanAbham dAsyati sa mudA bhavatE sham
